name: rocket-wars
description: browser-based game where players fire rockets at each other's base

scripts.check-file: FILES="$@"; if [ -z "$FILES" ]; then FILES="$(find src -type f -name '*.js')"; fi; for file in $FILES; do echo Checking $file...; node --input-type=module -c < "$file" || echo Error in $file; done

author: Phil George
